Section: How to install this package? This package can only be compiled on a system that has polymake correctly installed, like it is said in the polymake wiki itself. For more information about this please visit www.polymake.org. For\ installing this package, first make sure you have polymake installed. Copy it in your GAP pkg-directory and run the configure script (./configure) with your GAP root-directory as argument. The de\ fault is ../../... Then run make. After this, the package can be loaded via LoadPackage( "PolymakeInterface" );.
